## Import and prepare the data
```{r results="hide"}
library(skimr)

# Import the data
df <- read.csv("data/bc_ltc.csv", na.strings="", header=TRUE)
skim(df)
```


```{r}
# drop unneccessary columns
df2 <- df[,-c(1,3:12, 14:15)]
colnames(df2)

xtabs(~outbreak_status + Total.beds, data=df2)

```

Logistic regression

```{r}

data <- df2[,-c(1:2)]
head(data)

fit = glm(outbreak_status~., family=binomial, data=data)
summary(fit)
```
